content: the martha beanie is a free beanie knitting pattern featuring a stunning combination of lace and garter stitches perfect for knitters of most skill levels this beanie looks intricate but is surprisingly simple to knit worked in the round with seamless decreases that stay in pattern it creates a polished professional finish sizes range from newborn to large adult making it ideal for matching family sets or handmade gifts knit with cascade 220 superwash affiliate link 1 and size 7 needles this versatile hat offers both warmth and elegance download the free pattern now and add a touch of lace to your knitwear collection sizes newborn baby child teen/small adult large adult yarn cascade 220 superwash affiliate link 2 or any comparable worsted weight yarn needles us 7 4 5mm circular needles or dpns gauge 20 sts x 24 row = 4 inches in lace pattern after blocking techniques lace knitting garter stitch working in the round crown decreases link free pattern available here 3 1 https //shrsl com/4t1bb 2 https //shrsl com/4t1bb 3 https //amandammorse com/free-beanie-knitting-pattern-the-martha-beanie/
